title: Seal of Biliteracy  |  Test Credit & Placement  |  Admission & Aid  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Test Credit & Placement Credit Given by Exam Online Placement Process Seal of Biliteracy Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Test Credit & Placement>Seal of Biliteracy Seal of Biliteracy Students entering DePaul with theSeal of Biliteracywill be awarded credit for the 104, 105, and 106 courses in their specified language. To receive credit for the Seal, students must submit their Final High School transcript to: DePaul UniversityOffice of Admission1 East Jackson BlvdChicago, IL 60604 within 3 years after high school graduation.
